title: 111…1 Squared
text:
We call an integerSticksif its decimal representation contains only digit 1.Let S(n) be the sticks withndigits, find the sum of digits of S(n)2For example, S(9)2=12345678987654321, its sum of digits is 81.InputEach line contains an integer representsn(1 ≤n≤ 1018).Input is terminated by EOF, and contains at most 100 lines.OutputFor eachn, print an integer represents the answer.ExampleInput:9
10Output:81
82
